Description: Introduces potential customers to your product and earns a reward if the deal closes.
Actively prospects and qualifies leads, then passes them to your internal sales team.
Owns the sales process end-to-end and sells your product directly to customers.
Resells your product along with their own services like setup, training, or customization.
Promotes your product online and earns commissions based on traffic, leads, or conversions.
Sells your product through their existing distribution network or ecosystem.
Helps customers set up, configure, and adopt your product after the sale.
Collaborates with you on joint sales or marketing initiatives to mutual customer bases.
Purchases your product in bulk and resells it to other vendors or retail channels.
Pays to use, rebrand, or distribute your product or technology in a specific market.
